title: Real Guns Sound Pack
description: 152 high-quality realistic gun sound effects, containing gunshot and reloading sounds, consisting of mono and stereo versions of audio files.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/real-guns-sound-pack-preview

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/1alx5hs544q290d/MSE%20-%20Real%20Guns%20Sound%20Pack.pdf?dl=0


The collection contains 152 professionally designed sound effects of machine gun (2 variations), pistol (2), automatic rifle (1), heavy rifle (1), sniper rifle (1) and shotgun (1), as well as reloading. 


Each weapon includes 16 shot variations and 4 separate reload variations.

Machine gun, pistol, automatic rifle, heavy rifle have both single shots and bursts of shots. The sniper rifle and shotgun have one-shot sounds with reloads immediately after firing.


Use this asset to create high-quality gun shots and weapon sounds for your game, animation or trailer. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 152 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, mono & stereo
  • 304 audio files in total
  • 2 machine guns, 2 pistols
  • 1 automatic rifle, 1 heavy rifle
  • 1 sniper rifle, 1 shotgun
  • 8 guns in total
  • 16 shot variations, 4 reload variations
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for shooters, strategies and more

 

Number of Audio Waves: 304

Number of Audio Cues: 304

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 4 minutes 10 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
